backend/default_fingering_config.mo: Defines the default Alto C Ocarina fingering configuration as a Motoko module, mapping note names to boolean hole arrays for C4–F4.
backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor exposing query and update functions for managing ocarina fingering defaults and saving/retrieving/listing MIDI compositions in stable storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for multi-octave keyboard, octave range settings, fingering pattern generation, and note mapper updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Ocarina Composer SPA, mounting the React app at the `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full-page layout with Header, MusicEditor, and Footer in a flex column.
frontend/src/components/FingeringConfigE: Table-based editor component for viewing and toggling the 4-hole fingering pattern for each of the 13 chromatic notes in the active ocarina octave range, with a reset button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM parameters and a dynamic copyright year.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header showing the Ocarina Composer title, music icon, and a subtitle describing the instrument type.
frontend/src/components/LoadCompositionD: Dialog allowing users to load a saved composition either by selecting from a scrollable list or by entering a numeric ID directly, with error handling and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LyricsEditor.tsx: Renders a horizontal row of text inputs for editing per-note lyrics, displaying the note name/octave above each input field.
frontend/src/components/MusicEditor.tsx: Main composition editor component that integrates the piano keyboard, sheet music, ocarina illustration, tablature, lyrics editor, playback controls, and save/load dialogs into a single UI.
frontend/src/components/NoteDurationSele: Renders a row of buttons for selecting note duration (whole, half, quarter, eighth, sixteenth), highlighting the currently selected duration.
frontend/src/components/OcarinaIllustrat: Displays an SVG illustration of a 4-hole ocarina with holes visually toggled open or closed based on the fingering pattern for the currently selected note.
frontend/src/components/OcarinaSettingsD: A settings dialog with tabs for configuring the ocarina's octave range and fingering patterns, including options to save or reset global fingering defaults via API calls.
frontend/src/components/OcarinaTablature: Renders a grid-based tablature view showing the 4-hole fingering diagram for each note in the composition, highlighting the currently playing note.
frontend/src/components/PianoKeyboard.ts: Renders a full piano keyboard spanning C3–C7 with white and black keys, visually highlighting the active ocarina range and allowing note input via click.
frontend/src/components/PlaybackControls: Simple playback control component that renders a Play or Stop button depending on the current playback state.
frontend/src/components/SaveCompositionD: A dialog component for saving an ocarina composition with title/description inputs. On success, displays the returned composition ID with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/SheetMusic.tsx: Renders a visual sheet music view of notes using SVG staff lines and note heads, supporting selection, playback highlighting, duration changes, and lyrics editing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using an anonymous or authenticated identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayback.ts: A hook that manages Web Audio API playback of a note sequence, scheduling ocarina sounds and visual note-highlight callbacks based on tempo, with play/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useComposition.ts: A hook that manages the full composition state including notes, time signature, tempo, octave range, and fingering configuration, seeding fingering defaults from the backend on first load.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on compositions and fingering defaults via the backend actor, plus helper functions to convert between backend and frontend fingering config types.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/types/music.ts: Defines core TypeScript types for the music domain: Note, Composition, TimeSignature, FingeringPattern, FingeringConfiguration, and OctaveRange.
frontend/src/utils/audioSynthesis.ts: Implements `createOcarinaSound` which builds a Web Audio API graph with two detuned sine oscillators, a lowpass filter, and an ADSR envelope to synthesize an ocarina-like tone.
frontend/src/utils/compositionSerializer: Provides `serializeComposition` and `deserializeComposition` functions that convert a Composition object to/from a UTF-8 encoded JSON Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/defaultFingeringPatte: Defines the default 4-hole ocarina fingering sequence and exports `getDefaultFingeringPatterns` to generate a 13-note FingeringConfiguration for a given base octave, plus predefined OCTAVE_RANGES constants.
frontend/src/utils/ocarinaNoteMapper.ts: Utility functions for mapping notes to fingering patterns, computing equal-temperament frequencies, and checking whether a note falls within a given ocarina octave range.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends theme with custom radius, shadows, fonts, and accordion animations, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 27) describing the app's features, architectural decisions, and known issues for a 4-hole ocarina tablature music writing app.
